title: [Git]わざとrabaseやmergeでconflictを起こしてトラブル対策の練習をしてみる

comments.author: kumamoto
comments.body_markdown:
# 下記あとで清書
main-develop-feature
developにoptがpushしていてそれを自分がまだmainしかないときにpullするとorigin/developができるだけで
自動でdevelopが斬られるわけではない=>git cb developしてmergeすべき

先にfeatureを切る
同じ時期にoptがdevelopにpushしている

developに戻ってpullする

[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git rebase develop
Auto-merging main.txt
CONFLICT (content): Merge conflict in main.txt
error: could not apply 6c12741... update/1
Resolve all conflicts manually, mark them as resolved with
"git add/rm <conflicted_files>", then run "git rebase --continue".
You can instead skip this commit: run "git rebase --skip".
To abort and get back to the state before "git rebase", run "git rebase --abort".
Could not apply 6c12741... update/1


[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git br -a
* (no branch, rebasing feature/kuma)
  develop
  feature/kuma
  main
  remotes/origin/develop
  remotes/origin/main


[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git st
interactive rebase in progress; onto f5bd5eb
Last command done (1 command done):
   pick 6c12741 update/1
Next commands to do (2 remaining commands):
   pick f9afead update/2
   pick 024b150 update/3
  (use "git rebase --edit-todo" to view and edit)
You are currently rebasing branch 'feature/kuma' on 'f5bd5eb'.
  (fix conflicts and then run "git rebase --continue")
  (use "git rebase --skip" to skip this patch)
  (use "git rebase --abort" to check out the original branch)

Unmerged paths:
  (use "git restore --staged <file>..." to unstage)
  (use "git add <file>..." to mark resolution)
        both modified:   main.txt

<<<<<<< HEAD
piyopiyo
=======
update1
>>>>>>> 6c12741 (update/1)

修正
git add hoge
git rebase --continue

git rebase -i


rebaseして怒られが発生したら
[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git rebase --abort
[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git rebase -i

developから3つコミットしてたら
[kumamoto gitrouble2]$ git rebase -i HEAD^^^

# p, pick <commit> = use commit
# r, reword <commit> = use commit, but edit the commit message
# e, edit <commit> = use commit, but stop for amending
# s, squash <commit> = use commit, but meld into previous commit

e 67adc24 update1
s abab223 update2
s c5d1ca9 update3

squash
git rebase --continueしてsqush終わらせた
ここでようやくrebase developができる
